sentences.en: Although he's ninety, his mental faculties remain unimpaired.
sentences.cn: 他虽年届九旬，但头脑仍然清晰。

sentences.en: America was far richer in the nineties.
He is ninety years old, but his mind is sharp.
sentences.cn: 他虽然90岁了, 但头脑还很灵活.

sentences.en: He pivoted his whole body through ninety degrees.
He's ninety, but still he lives on.
Her weight was under ninety pounds.
It was decided she had to stay another ninety days.
sentences.cn: 经决定，她必须再呆九十天。

sentences.en: Members of parliament approved the move by a majority of ninety-nine.
sentences.cn: 议员以99张的多数票批准了这项动议.

sentences.en: Ninety - five per cent of the new seedlings have survived.
Ninety per cent of lone parent families are headed by mothers.
Ninety-nine per cent of primary pupils now have hands-on experience of computers.
sentences.cn: 现在，99%的小学生都亲手操作过电脑。

sentences.en: Oxford Road joins the High Street at an angle of ninety degrees.
sentences.cn: 牛津路与该大街垂直相交.

sentences.en: President Cristiani expected the case to come to court within ninety days.
sentences.cn: 克里斯蒂亚尼总统要求案件在90天内送交法院审理。

sentences.en: Secret investigations have netted ninety staff suspected of fraud and theft.
sentences.cn: 秘密调查已抓获90名涉嫌欺诈盗窃的职员。

sentences.en: She was lumbered with a bill for about ninety pounds.
sentences.cn: 她必须得偿付一张90英镑左右的账单。

sentences.en: Statistically, ninety-eight percent of all acute sunstroke cases are fatal.
sentences.cn: 据统计，急性中暑病例中有98%是致命的。

sentences.en: Within ninety minutes the ship was ready for departure.

words.tran_cn: 第九十的；九十分之一的
